text: For I fear that when I come I may not find you as I wish, and that you may not find me as you wish. I fear that there may be 12:20 quarrels ¦ quarreling NA PCK SBL WHquarrels, 12:20 jealousies ¦ jealousy CTjealousies, fits of anger, selfish ambitions, insults, words of gossip, puffed up behaviors, and disorderly actions.
